title: Spiritual Rishikesh Retreat
description: Find inner peace through yoga and meditation
highlights: Daily yoga and meditation sessions with certified instructors
Participate in the mesmerizing Ganga Aarti ceremony
Visit ancient temples and traditional ashrams
Rejuvenating Ayurvedic spa treatments
Spiritual discourse with renowned gurus and masters
includes: Guided temple visits and spiritual tours
excludes: Any meals not mentioned in inclusions
importantInfo: Strictly vegetarian meals only - no non-veg food allowed
Alcohol and smoking are strictly prohibited in ashram premises
Comfortable, modest clothing required for yoga and temple visits
Valid government ID proof mandatory for all participants
Medical certificate required if you have any health conditions
Minimum age requirement: 16 years

reviews.name: Priya Sharma
reviews.text: Life-changing experience! The spiritual atmosphere and yoga sessions were incredible. The guides were knowledgeable and the ashram stay was authentic.

reviews.name: Rajesh Kumar
reviews.text: Great organization and wonderful guides. The Ganga Aarti was mesmerizing and the meditation sessions helped me find inner peace.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.text: Perfect blend of spirituality and comfort. Highly recommended for soul searching. The vegetarian food was surprisingly delicious!
